粉療.name: Powder Heal
粉療.description: Once during your turn, you may heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.

反擊.name: Counterattack
反擊.description: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the attacking Pokémon.

硬殼盔甲.name: Shell Armor
硬殼盔甲.description: This Pokémon takes -10 damage from attacks.

芳香陷阱.name: Fragrance Trap
芳香陷阱.description: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, once during your turn, you may switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Basic Pokémon to the Active Spot.

水手裡劍.name: Water Shuriken
水手裡劍.description: Once during your turn, you may do 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

伏特充能.name: Volt Charge
伏特充能.description: Once during your turn, you may take a Lightning Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

影子咒縛.name: Shadowy Spellbind
影子咒縛.description: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent can't use any Supporter cards from their hand.

引夢擺錘.name: Sleep Pendulum
引夢擺錘.description: Once during your turn, you may flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

移形換影.name: Psy Shadow
移形換影.description: Once during your turn, you may take 1 Psychic Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to the Psychic Pokémon in the Active Spot.

瓦斯漏氣.name: Gas Leak
瓦斯漏氣.description: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may make your opponent's Active Pokémon Poisoned.

堅硬膜.name: Hard Coat
堅硬膜.description: This Pokémon takes -20 damage from attacks.

驅離.name: Wing Attack
驅離.description: Once during your turn, you may switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

資料掃描.name: Data Scan
資料掃描.description: Once during your turn, you may look at the top card of your deck.
